title: (x) The Park at Hurstbourne - Baker Signet {Grant, Mike Y}
content:
what font is the main serif font?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141506im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21818.jpg)
author: signs79

comments.content: Ooh, that's what I call a squeaker, Mike.
Nice work. It was in the Image Club Catalog, so I know you'd know it immediately. I notice we found showings at two different sites. You were quicker on the mouse.
